short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your quest for up-to-date World of Tanks intel got reinforcements. Get straight to the source of information within your browser.
short.ru: WoT Live — это: • свежие новости; • видео с официальных каналов и канала WoT Fan; • удобное отслеживание тем на форуме; •…

long.ru:
Your quest for up-to-date World of Tanks intel just got reinforcements. With WoT live, you can get straight to the source of information, right within your browser. It’s your guide to easily find out what’s happening across all of our social media channels. All the latest news, videos and Premium Shop offers are now just a click away.
Direct access to:
•	All the latest news and information about all special offers, and in-game specials 
•	All videos from the World of Tanks YouTube channel
•	Access to the World of Tanks official forum 
•	Premium Shop (buy Premium vehicles and various bundles in one click)
WoT Live is available across 4 regions: Russia, Europe, Asia, and North America.
Download the extension now so you are always one step ahead of the competition.
